author: Poster
title: Ultra Air Heater: Unveiling The Future Of Portable Heating
text:
Ultra Air Portable Heater is a top-notch device deeply revered for its efficient performance and compact design, making it one of the best portable heaters on the market. Promoting practicality, efficiency, and versatility, it embodies a perfect blend of style and functionality. One of the main reasons contributing to its popularity is its portability, which allows the user to enjoy a warm and cozy atmosphere anywhere at any time.The Ultra Air Portable Heater remains
unrivalled when it comes to its heating capabilities. It has a top output of 1500 watts, providing ample heating strength to warm up small to medium-sized rooms swiftly. With an in-built energy-efficient heat setting that warms up your space without exhausting your electricity, it stands apart from many heaters in terms of energy-saving attributes.Another way this heater stands apart is its revolutionary safety features. Equipped with an automatic shut-off feature, the heater turns off when it tips over or gets too hot, reducing any risk of accidents. Furthermore, it is designed with cool-to-touch exteriors, ensuring it doesn't become too hot to handle, thereby providing an additional layer of safety for households with children or pets.This portable heater comes with an adjustable thermostat, enabling you to manage your room‚Äôs temperature according to your preference. It possesses a range of pre-sets for easy temperature control, allowing you to choose between different heating modes. From maintaining a slightly warm ambiance during the transition months to delivering intense heat during chilly winters, the Ultra Air Portable Heater is hands-on efficient.An attribute that truly sets the Ultra Air Portable Heater apart is its leading-edge technology for quiet operation. Unlike traditional heaters that make a lot of noise, this heater ensures your peace and serenity are undisturbed, enabling you to read, study, work, or sleep without nuisance.An essential feature of any gadget nowadays is ease-of-use, and the Ultra Air Portable Heater is absolutely user-friendly. The design includes easy-to-read digital controls and a simple-to-use programming timer. It also comes with a remote control, providing convenience to change settings without having to move around. The lightweight design makes it easy to transport, and the compact size makes storage hassle-free.An often overlooked factor when it comes to heaters is their aesthetics. However, it is vital, particularly if you wish your heater to blend in seamlessly with your interior d√©cor while offering functionality. The Ultra Air Portable Heater bestows an elegantly sleek design, making it a stylish addition to any space.The Eco-mode of this heater is another winning card. If you run it on Eco-mode, the heater will provide adequate heat while consuming less power, thereby benefiting your electricity bills and promoting sustainable usage.From reviews pooled across various platforms, Ultra Air Portable Heater often receives glowing feedback from users. They appreciate its fast and efficient heating, convenience, quietness, safety mechanisms and exceptional energy-saving features. Portability also remains a recurring praise point among users, as it allows them to shift warmth according to their needs.In conclusion, the Ultra Air Portable Heater is an excellent choice for those seeking a reliable, feature-rich, stylish, safe, and cost-effective heating solution. With its cutting-edge heating elements, sophisticated safety systems, user-friendly operation, and superb energy conservation, the Ultra Air Portable Heater will remain a favorite among users, providing warmth when and where it's needed the most.

author: Nepal News July
title: Minister Khadka insists on coordination with China to minimize disaster risk
text:
KATHMANDU: In the wake of devastation caused by the flashflood in Rasuwa district, bordering the northern neighbour, Minister for Energy, Water Resource and Irrigation, Dipak Khadka, has insisted on establishing an effective coordination with Chinese government to minimize damages from disasters.
‚ÄúAs many rivers flow from northern neighbour China to Nepali territory, coordination and collaboration with China is essential to minimize the impact of river floods and landslides in Nepal,‚Äù Khadka said during a ministry level discussion on Thursday. The discussion dwelt on preparedness and management of monsoon related disaster.
Minister Khadka reminded, ‚ÄúThere was no rainfall neither the breach of lake. But why was there a flash flood in the Bhotekoshi in Rasuwa district? If the siren was
installed by the Weather Forecasting Division, information on the disaster could be received on time so as to reduce damages,‚Äù he stressed. The Minister argued although proper system for data and information was repeatedly raised in the ministry, it was not put into practice, creating such problems.
According to Nepal government has given priority to the conservation of glacial lake. If the glacial lakes in China burst, it poses serious threats to Nepal. So, coordination with Chinese side is necessary, he underlined.
The Minister, however, said, ‚ÄúThe government is facing resources crunch. We need early warning system in place. If such facility is ensured in the projects like hydropower to canals, it would help minimize damages.‚Äù
He directed the subordinates and concerned officials to move ahead by forming a committee to make smooth the preparedness.
Similarly, he informed that he would hold a discussion with Finance Ministry to allow discount on import of materials used for reconstruction of infrastructures damaged by the landslides and floods. He urged the employees to work in a way to ensures results that satisfies service seekers.
Ministry Secretary Sarita Dawadi said time has come to add stations in mountainous and hilly regions for early warning system. The activities relating to disaster in the ministry need an integrated approach to address the problems, she reminded.
On the occasion, Executive Director at NEA, Hitendra Dev Shakya, said the floods in Bhotekoshi caused a huge damage in hydropower- Rasuwagadhi, Chilime, Trishuli-III (B).
Other speakers in the discussion underlined the need of reinforcing coordination at all three tiers of government.

author: Elodie Collins
title: Labor Department Publishes AI Best Practices
text:
The Department of Labor has published guidance to ensure that artificial intelligence development and deployment in the workplace preserve job quality and support worker well-being. The AI Best Practices serves as a comprehensive roadmap designed for technology developers and employers, the department said Wednesday.
The document is in line with the department‚Äôs AI and Worker Well-being: Principles for Developers and Employers, released in May . Both guidelines are developed in compliance with President Joe Biden‚Äôs Oct. 30 Executive Order on the Safe, Secure and Trustworthy Development and Use of AI .
AI Best Practices for the Workplace The newly published document identifies strategies that enable businesses to benefit from AI without violating worker rights. Some of the strategies outlined are providing AI training, being transparent on the technology‚Äôs employment in the workplace, maintaining human oversight on important employment decisions and securing worker data.
‚ÄúThese Best Practices provide a roadmap for responsible AI in the workplace, helping businesses harness these technologies while proactively supporting and valuing their workers,‚Äù commented Acting Labor Secretary Julie Su. ‚ÄúAs we embrace the opportunities that AI can offer, we must ensure workers are lifted up, not left behind.‚Äù
The document follows the AI and Inclusive Hiring Framework developed by the Office of Disability Employment Policy and the Partnership on Employment & Accessible Technology to prevent employment discrimination in the hiring process.

text: Estremecedora ca√≠da de un esquiador, en la Copa del Mundo: fue retirado en helic√≥ptero Momentos de m√°xima tensi√≥n se vivieron, este jueves, en Italia, luego de que Marco Schwarz, esquiador favorito al t√≠tulo, sufriera un fuerte accidente en competencia. Marco Schwarz, promesa austr√≠aca del esqu√≠ alpino que lideraba la clasificaci√≥n de la general de la Copa del Mundo, no podr√° volver a competir en la actual temporada debido a las serias heridas que sufri√≥ este jueves durante el descenso de Bormio (Italia). En una estrepitosa ca√≠da en Bormio, el esquiador de 28 a√±os "sufri√≥ una [rotura del ligamento cruzado, una rotura del menisco interno y da√±os en el cart√≠lago de su rodilla derecha](https://sports.caracoltv.com/deportes) El atleta ser√° operado el viernes, en la cl√≠nica privada de Hochrum por el especialista Christian Fink, el mismo que hace unos d√≠as oper√≥ al futbolista austr√≠aco David Alaba, defensa del Real Madrid, de su lesi√≥n de ligamento cruzado. Tras caer durante el descenso en Bormio, Schwarz, que sal√≠a en la decimos√©ptima posici√≥n, se sali√≥ de la pista y termin√≥ contra las vallas protectoras, teniendo que ser, primero, atendido, bloqueada su pierna derecha y, tras unos minutos, ser trasladado en un helic√≥ptero a Innsbruck. ‚õ∑Ô∏èüí•üá¶üáπ La forta caiguda de Marco Schwarz al descens de Bormio‚Äî laneualdia (@laneualdia) [#infoneu] [#infonieve] [#nieve] [#esqu√≠] [#snowboard] [#ski] [#snow] [#neu] [https://t.co/27K9gVmEAx] [pic.twitter.com/OfVjqUkDCl] [December 28, 2023] Ello motiv√≥ que la prueba fuera interrumpida durante una veintena de minutos. Acudi√≥ a Bormio como cabeza de la general de la Copa del Mundo y aspiraba a consolidarse este invierno como uno de los mejores en todas las categor√≠as.
